name: seva-sahayog-portal
description: Donation Matching Portal for Seva Sahayog Foundation - Mastercard Code for Change 2.0

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd server && npm start
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/build server/logs || true
scripts.pack:kits: cd team-kits && for d in */ ; do zip -r ../$${d%/}.zip "$d"; done && cd - >/dev/null

author: Team-10 - Mastercard Code for Change 2.0
